properties.description: Regular activities: Yoga classes, Youth club, dance, accessible exercise classes, film nights, choir, art and crafts, Coffee mornings. I.T. Cafe, on Tuesday 2.00pm - 4.00pm. People can bring along their laptops and learn the basics of the internet and security. There are computers available for those that want to learn the basics of using a computer or want access to a computer.

properties.description: We provide food and other basic essentials for people in need in these difficult times. There is also a social element to the project in that we can provide a space where people can sit and chat, enjoy a cup of tea or coffee and a hot meal.
